about_the_game:
Step into the intense world of U.S. politics with Election Tycoon! In this real-time strategy game, you'll take on the role of a presidential candidate in the 2024 elections. Whether you choose to be Donald Trump, Kamala Harris, or create your own independent candidate, your goal is to sway the nation and secure your place in the White House.


Success in Election Tycoon requires more than just promises. You'll need to strategically build fund, vote, and propaganda buildings across different states. Fund buildings help you raise the money needed to power your campaign, vote buildings increase your support in key states, and propaganda buildings shift political alignments in your favor. But be careful—every decision counts!


Each state in Election Tycoon is a battleground with its own dynamics. Choose from different map modes to analyze the situation and deploy your resources where they’ll have the most impact. Whether you're focusing on swing states or reinforcing your strongholds, the path to victory is in your hands.

While winning the election is the ultimate goal, there's an extra layer of satisfaction in turning the entire map to your party's color. It's a visual representation of your success and a fun challenge for those who want to leave their mark on the country's history.


Election Tycoon is designed to be accessible to all players, but true mastery will require careful planning and strategy. With multiple factors to consider and optimize, creating the perfect campaign will test even the most seasoned strategists.

Election Tycoon offers a variety of fun and challenging achievements that add an extra layer of flavor to the game. These achievements are designed to be both rewarding and entertaining, pushing you to explore different strategies and scenarios to unlock them all. Can you rise to the challenge and earn them all?

Play as Trump, Harris, or create your own candidate.
Build and manage fund, propaganda, and vote buildings across the U.S.
Complete missions to upgrade and enhance your campaign.
Explore different map modes to assess state dynamics.
Turn the entire map to your party’s color for a visual victory.
Unlock unique, fun, and challenging achievements.
Easy to learn but challenging to master, offering depth for strategy enthusiasts.

Wishlist now!
Wishlist to get updated when we release. Every wishlist helps our development of the game!

name: Election Tycoon: Trump vs Harris

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Election Tycoon: Trump vs Harris

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2 GHz dual core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Hardware Accelerated Graphics with dedicated memory
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Election Tycoon is a real-time strategy game where you lead a campaign to win the 2024 US elections as Trump, Harris, or your own independent candidate. Influence states, color the US map in your party's colors, and outmaneuver your opponents in a high-stakes, map-based political battle.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Turkish*
*languages with full audio support
